scenes.text:
Hi, we are ladies football at Cardiff Univeristy, aka CULF.

We are one of the most rapidly growing clubs of Cardiff’s Athletic Union and we pride ourselves in creating opportunities for females to continuing playing an elite level of football at university. With the integration of our development team and IMG leagues in the past couple of years, we have teams suited to all abilities. Whether you wish to play competitively, for fun, or just enjoy the social aspect, CULF prides itself on its footballing success and its inclusive social scene. 

Students find CULF a wonderful way to socialise and make friendships that last a lifetime!

The First Team and Second team, the 1A and 2B division has games every Wednesday, as well as the development squad. The Futsal Team has games on Saturdays.

Games are hosted both at the Talybont Sports Training Village, and a Llanrumney, as well as away games across England and Wales.

We also have socials every Wednesday afternoon/evening.

Our training schedule is available on our SU page.

We have three different types of memberships, each with different costs:

Standard Membership: £45.00
Social Membership: £15.00
Erasmus Membership: £20.00
Our socials consist of trainings, yolo and clubbing trips, and games, as well as other socials which we post about on our social medias!
